Runtime is ultra-minimal2. Compiles to pure RegEx3. Automatically typed capture groups4. Natural language syntaxThis library is a port of the [magic-regexp](https://regexp.dev) JavaScript module by [Daniel Roe](https://roe.dev/).## QuickstartFirst, install `magicregex` by```shellpip install magicregex```Second, find e-mails in text by```pythonimport magicregex as mrereg = mre.createRegEx( mre.exactly( mre.letter.TimesAtLeast(1) .And(mre.exactly('@')) .And(mre.letter.TimesAtLeast(1)) .And(mre.exactly('.')) .And(mre.letter.TimesAtLeast(2)) ))reg.findall('daniel@roe.uk lore ipsum thomas@wollmann.de') # Result: ['daniel@roe.uk', 'thomas@wollmann.de']```## DocumentationUp to now, this module is compatible with [magic-regexp](https://regexp.dev/getting-started/usage)'s documentation.## ContributeMade with ‚ù§Ô∏è.
